source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_SEQ_00<tab>Miounne has information on a new task.
target: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_SEQ_00<tab>ミューヌは冒険者に仕事の依頼をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_SEQ_01<tab>According to Miounne, the Adventurers' Guild in Ul'dah is recruiting people for an as-yet-undisclosed task. You can learn more by speaking to Momodi, the proprietress of the Quicksand.
target: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_SEQ_01<tab>ウルダハの冒険者ギルドが、冒険者を募集しているらしい。飛空艇を使ってウルダハへと赴き、クイックサンドにいる「モモディ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_SEQ_02<tab>You have expressed your interest in the task to Momodi. Let her know when you are ready to hear the details.
target: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_SEQ_02<tab>ミューヌの紹介を受けて、ウルダハへやってきた冒険者。仕事を受ける準備ができたら、再度モモディに声をかけよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Momodi at the Quicksand in Ul'dah.
target: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_TODO_00<tab>ウルダハのクイックサンドにいるモモディと話す

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MIOUNNE_000_1<tab>So, you're not averse to taking a little trip? Wonderful!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MIOUNNE_000_1仕事を受けてくれるのかい？
ありがとう。感謝するよ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MIOUNNE_000_2<tab>As I mentioned earlier, the request comes to us from the Adventurers' Guild in Ul'dah. Once you arrive, seek out Momodi, the proprietress of the Quicksand. Think of her as the sultanate's version of myself.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MIOUNNE_000_2依頼主はウルダハの冒険者ギルドだ。
「クイックサンド」の「モモディ」さんから、
話を聞いてきてもらえるかな？

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MIOUNNE_000_3<tab>Chances are she'll send you into the midst of danger, but I have every confidence that you will pull through unscathed. Now, off you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and good luck!
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MIOUNNE_000_3危険な仕事かもしれないが……
君ならきっとやり遂げると信じているよ。
よろしく頼んだよ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_10<tab>Welcome to the Quicksand, friend. I'm a tad busy right now, if you wouldn't mind showin' yourself to─
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_10あら、いらっしゃい。
ごめんなさい、今ちょっと忙しいのよ。
適当な席に座っててくれるかしら……って……。

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_11<tab>Oh, it's you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! And there I was, spoutin' the same tired line!
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_12<tab>Judgin' by your determined expression, I take it you ain't here for ale. Are you called <var 29 EB02 /var>, by any chance?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_12……その面構え。
もしかして、あなた……。
)) (( )) 03 /var>さん？

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_13<tab>Miounne sent word that you'd be reportin' for duty. She also made a point of callin' you the adventurer of the moment. That ain't no small praise, comin' from her.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_13冒険者ギルドの連絡網に、あなたの名前が挙がっていたの。
あなた、今、最も注目されている冒険者さんなのよ！
ミューヌさんが興奮するのも頷けるわ！

source: TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_14<tab>But you didn't come all the way here to listen to my prattle. Doubtless you're eager to get started, so let's talk business, shall we?
target:
TEXT_SUBFST103_00678_MOMODI_000_14さっそくだけどお願いがあるの。
準備ができたら声をかけてくれるとうれしいわ。
